      com.google.code.yanf4j.buffer中IoBuffer的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractIoBuffer
      A base implementation of IoBuffer.
      class  IoBufferWrapper
      A IoBuffer that wraps a buffer and proxies any operations to it.
